content: विश्लेषः {@--1@} Disunion, disjunction. {@--2@} Especially separation of lovers, or of husband and wife. {@--3@} Separation (in general); तनयाविश्लेषदुःखैः <ls>Ś. 4. 5</ls>; चरणारविंदविश्लेष <ls>R. 13. 23.</ls> {@--4@} Absence, loss, bereavement. {@--5@} A chasm. {@--6@} (In arith.) The converse of addition.
